verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> how my <S%H6862>adversaries<s%> have <S%H7231>increased!<s%> <S%H7227>Many<s%> are those who rise up against <S%H6965>me.<s%>
<S%H7227>Many<s%> there are who <S%H559>say<s%> of my <S%H5315>soul,<s%> "There is no <S%H3444>help<s%> for him in <S%H430>God.<s%>" <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
But <S%H3068>you,<s%> Yahweh, are a <S%H4043>shield<s%> around <S%H3519>me,<s%> my glory, and the one who lifts <S%H7311>up<s%> my <S%H7218>head.<s%>
I <S%H7121>cry<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> with my <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and he <S%H6030>answers<s%> me out of his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>hill.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
I laid myself <S%H7901>down<s%> and <S%H3462>slept.<s%> I <S%H6974>awakened;<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> sustains <S%H5564>me.<s%>
I will not be <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of tens of <S%H7233>thousands<s%> of <S%H5971>people<s%> who have <S%H7896>set<s%> themselves against me on every <S%H5439>side.<s%>

<S%H6965>Arise,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh!<s%> <S%H3467>Save<s%> <S%H430>me,<s%> my God! For you have <S%H5221>struck<s%> all of my <S%H341>enemies<s%> on the cheek <S%H3895>bone.<s%> You have <S%H7665>broken<s%> the <S%H8127>teeth<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>
<S%H3444>Salvation<s%> belongs to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> Your <S%H1293>blessing<s%> be on your <S%H5971>people.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
